lead_paragraph: A baseball movie with little baseball, this film asks: When a hot pitching prospect melts down, can an overzealous parent be far behind?

headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘The Phenom,’ Landing on the Couch for Losing the Strike Zone
headline.main: Review: In ‘The Phenom,’ Landing on the Couch for Losing the Strike Zone

snippet: A baseball movie with little baseball, this film asks: When a hot pitching prospect melts down, can an overzealous parent be far behind?
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews movie The Phenom, written and directed by Noah Buschel; Johnny Simmons, Paul Giamatti and Ethan Hawke star.
